Posts.Content: My oldest sister just found out yesterday she has Stage 1 breast cancer. She met with a dr. today for a consult and he is recommending surgery in two weeks. He said while he's in there they will inject dye to see if it's spread to her lymph nodes. Does anyone know if this is standard procedure? Thanks, Terri
Posts.Title: My sister just found out

Posts.Content: Thank you for the info and I am so sorry you are going through so much.
Posts.Title: My sister just found out

Posts.Content: Thank you for the quick response. I'm sorry you were Stage 3. Are you cancer-free now?   Terri
Posts.Title: My sister just found out
